activities: The Company maintains a centralized database in the United States, containing personal information about employees who work at the Company's subsidiaries and branches located in the European Union.  The Company may also obtain personal information relating to third parties, including prospective employees, customers and suppliers.
contacttitle1: Director of Human Resources Information Systems/Associate General Counsel
corpofftitle1: Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Automotive Parts & Service Equipment - (APS)Aircraft & Parts - (AIR)Electronic Components - (ELC)General Industrial Eqpt & Supplies - (GIE)
recoursemech: Independent recourse mechanisms exist for employees and for third parties.  Unresolved employee complaints are referred to local European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs); for Switzerland, unresolved employee complaints are referred to the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
